logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added an action that allows checking if a document exists in the given language.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg:
Added two methods for checking
1. if a document exists (exists()) 2. if a document with the given document-id and area (regardless of the language) exists (existsInAnyLanguage())

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Simplified the sitemap by introducing a resource which shares some common functionality.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: reflecting changes to other scheduler classes

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added an xsp and an xsl for the missing language screen.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Made the class deprecated as it has been superceded by the page-envelope input module.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Set this action to deprecated as it has been superceded by the document remove ant task.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Exceptions in the setter methods of DublinCore are no longer silently caught, but are now passed on.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: task wrapper bugfix, improved log messages

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: using webapp URL instead of document URL

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: JUnit class for the Dublin Core classes (Interface, Implementation and Proxy).

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The Dublin Core class has been rewritten to make proper use of the GoF Proxy Pattern. The old 'clever' algorithm had severe timing flaws, whereas the new algorithm is based on tried and proven technology. So the DublinCore class has been transformed into an interface, a proxy and an actual implementation which is used by the proxy.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Make sure the parameter names match the names of the params that the ant task is expecting.

logentry.author: michi
logentry.msg: PUT is handled by WebDAV sitemap

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Fixed a bug where the getResources method would also return subdirs. Added a method to fetch meta data.

logentry.author: michi
logentry.msg: PUT to WebDAV sitemap added, but there seems to be a problem

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Removed unused variable and unused cast.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Imporved Javadoc to clarify the fact that there is one language associated with a document but there are possibly a number of languages for which there are also documents with the same document-id.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Make sure the meta data update redirects back to the info screen.

logentry.msg: just for testing, not necessary anymore

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Simple upload action which just uploads an asset. It does not do any inserting of tags in xml files as the ImageUploadCreatorAction and is therefore more generic.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added the upload usecase matcher. Removed the pipelines for resourcenotfound and sax in the handle-error pipeline because they should not occur in the usecase macher unless there is a genuine error. In that case we want to see the stack trace.

logentry.msg: Do not return the meta files when asked for the resources, i.e. filter out the meta files.

logentry.msg: CSS styles need to be defined inline because the info area (or any area where the menu is shown) is tag soup.

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg:
#163
it is now possible to link into specific tabs in the info area from outside.
append lenya.tab=meta or another suitable tab. defaults to overview

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg:
Added the Exception selector to the sitemap which catches the ParentNotFoundException and returns a nice error message when a document is published whose parent doc hasn't been published.
Added a nice error screen in the lenya look.
Added usecase pipelines for info-meta saving.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The publisher now returns a special Exception if the piblishing failed because the parent node could not be located in the live tree, i.e. when the user publishes a document whose parent document has not been published.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: - including scheduler CSS - using lenya prefix for scheduler CSS classes

logentry.msg: using standardized resource calls for publishing and creating usecases

logentry.msg: Added support for publisher and date created.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added constants for publisher and date created.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg:
get and set datePublished is gone, since it is not in the dublin core standard. Instead we should use dateIssued instead.
Also added dateCreated.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Provide a better message in the Exception.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Dont allow setting any of the dates as they are set by internal processes.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Ant task to write the dublin core values.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The dublic core class has been changed to be more efficient. It no longer parses the document xml for each query. Due to the change some different Exceptions are thrown and this made a change to some other classes and interfaces necessary.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: changed links from admin tab to other tabs to /index.html

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: made navigation elements pick up the right language

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The actual creation of the new language version needs to pass the doctype to the task which can only be queried with the uriparametrizer. So added the uriparametrizer to the step "create" of the "create-language" usecase. create-language should properly initialize the workflow now.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: changed path computation for better performance

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: changed path computation for better performance

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The init-history task now also takes the language as an argument.

logentry.msg: moved session initialization from revisions to overview tab

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The init workflow task now also accepts the langaueg as a parameter. So it can initialize different workflows for the same document with different languages.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: - initializing context file only once - resolving publication ID as key instead of building publication

logentry.msg: added 1.0rc1 release to download section removed misleading text in recommended software

logentry.msg: adding parent and required children started to implement

logentry.msg: made navigation elements pick up the right language

logentry.msg: Fix a nullPointerException by querying the node for != null before asking it for it's languages.

logentry.msg: - using AC resolver to get authorizer - reflecting changes to usecase authorizer

logentry.msg: not releasing access controller (cached by ac resolver)

logentry.msg: using caching for usecase role configuration

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: replaced PolicyCache by more generic SourceCache

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Be a little bit more clever when it comes to picking a language if none is specified. It used to simply choose the default language, but that might not exist for this document. So check if the document has a version in the default lang, if not pick the first one from the list of langs that the document has.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The implementation of getLanguages now checks the site tree instead of the file system and should therefore be much faster.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added an Exception class for document specific exceptions.

logentry.author: michi
logentry.msg: not deprecated because certain methods are missing from alternative versions

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The setter for the area should of course be called setArea (as opposed to setAbsolutetreepath :-().

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: fixed bug (used wrong URL policy path)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: switched from files to input streams

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: - improved policy caching - using document-id for policy resolving

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: When creating the task-id should be "create" instead of "create-workflow".

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Add asterix to the mandatory fields.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Make sure the current date is passed through.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: When successfully removing a label do not redirect to the original page anymore (because it doesn't exist anymore). Instead redirect to the URL without the language (which is now exported by the page envelope module).

logentry.msg: Fix the parameter names to match the names in the ant file and make the user question more verbose.

logentry.msg: HTML Form Editor insert and delete icons added

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: - declaring AbstractAccessControllerResolver as ThreadSafe - using AccessController caching

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg:
started breadcrumb-prefix support
this allows to have a prefix per publication that gets prepended to the breadcrumb path. useful for publications that are part of a larger site

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: split info tabs into seperate pages

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Pass the language along the reuqest.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Adapted to the new TreePublisher interface where you no longer have to specify the path to the site trees and now have to specify the language that you want to publish.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The source to be published is actually the document-path as returned by the page envelope input module. No more fiddling with the URL (which had assuptions that no longer where true with multilingual URLs).

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The TreePublisher no longer needs the path to the authoring and the live trees. It simply asks the publication for the site trees for the authoring and the live area. It also now takes the language into account when publishing.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Removed the deprecated usage of the SiteTree constructors.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The unit test case for the publisher had many things hard coded and above all did not work anymore. Made it more general (with the path mapper) and made it works again.

logentry.msg: use default language from page envelope

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: This task is now derived from PublicationTask and no longer needs the path of the site tree. Instead you can pass the area in and it will find the associated site tree.

logentry.author: michi
logentry.msg: unique numbering and temporary source writing implemented

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The interface to the creator has changed so the unit test needs to adapt. Also since the language is appended now to the xml file the assuption on the file has change and so this assertion needed to be changed. The creator test works again.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg:
Added a new constructor to DefaultSiteTree which doesn't require you to specify a filename. Instead it asks for a pub dir and an area.
The other constructors are deprecated.
Also the publication now has a getter method which allows you to request the sitetree for a specific area.

logentry.msg: empty string as default e-mail address when loading

logentry.msg: make the log instance variable private to satisfy checkstyle.

logentry.msg: Fixed a bug in the documentation.

logentry.author: michi
logentry.msg: Copying publication specific Java classes fixed

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added the optional.jar from the ant distribution. Since it probably makes sense to have the ant.jar and the optional.jar to be from the same (nighly) snapshot and there is no way I could find out from which snapshot the old jar was I replaced the ant.jar with the jar from the same snapshot as the optional.jar.
